ValidationRule.description: Resolution Date is required if the Status is set to Closed.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: (ISPICKVAL( PgM_Status__c, 'Closed') || ISPICKVAL( PgM_Status__c, 'Closed - Pending Review')) && (RecordType.Name = 'Issue' || RecordType.Name = 'Risk') && ISBLANK( PgM_Resolution_Date__c )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please enter a Resolution Date before closing.
